eson.co2p.se

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • eson.co2p.se.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Includes methods for creating all the messages that's going to the server from the server, also includes minor static math methods used in separate places
    Author:
    isidor on 2014-10-15.

      • sendMessage

        public static byte[] sendMessage(java.lang.String message,
                 int type,
                 int Tabid)
        String message = the message to be sent int type = type of the message, eg. 0 = ordinary text, 1=compressed message 2=crypt message 3=compressed and crypt message
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be sent
        type - ordinary/compressed/crypt
        Returns:
        the converted bytearray containing the PDU header + message

      • div4

        public static int div4(int testInt)
        div4 tests if and int is divisible by four, if it isn't return the rounded up number to ciel that's divisible by four.
        Parameters:
        testInt - the int to be tested if it is modulus 4
        Returns:
        the int that's tested plus ciel modulus 4 of that int

        getTime returns the time in seconds since the 1970's

        the time in seconds since the 1970's
